author: sky.cactus
content: <@489256758989029405> You should fill out <https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/pull/3410> relatively soon.  We have had problems in the past with people squatting EIP numbers so as editors we generally frown on people creating empty EIPs.  I think in this case you just wanted to get some links created ASAP, but I'm hesitant to give special consideration for you because I happen to know your motives.

author: samajammin
content: Thanks! Created an issue, will update ASAP https://github.com/ethereum/ethereum-org-website/issues/2687
